definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The Nokia 1209 also has a one-piece key mat for durability and reliability.
sentences.chinese: 諾基亞1209也同樣是一款耐用和可靠的好機型。

sentences.english: They are incredibly sturdy, thanks to the durability of their bamboo hulls.
sentences.chinese: 它們非常堅固，感謝竹船的耐用。

sentences.english: I also like that the tech is supposed to be durable, reducing e-waste.
sentences.chinese: 另外，這項技術是可持續耐用的，能減少電損耗。

sentences.english: I want to buy a heavy-duty tool set that will last a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 我想買一套結實耐用的，可以使用一輩子的工具。

sentences.english: SUS 304 structure, resist Acid and Alkali corrosion, 10 years lifespan.
sentences.chinese: 全不鏽鋼結構，耐酸鹼，堅固耐用。

sentences.english: Electroplated copper shell can be used for many years.
PU-coated leather provides durability and easy care.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯塗層皮革提供耐用性。

sentences.english: The works of these watches are all home-produced and wear well.
sentences.chinese: 這些手錶的做工是國產的並且很耐用。

sentences.english: Injecting a high power, stable performance, Precise and durable and so on.
sentences.chinese: 射膠力高，性能穩定，精密耐用等特點。

sentences.english: Floral-patterned rubber outsole provides lightweight durability and traction.
sentences.chinese: 花卉圖案的橡膠外底提供輕便耐用性和牽引力。

sentences.english: Applied to engine circulatory system. Anti-corrosion. Economic durability.
sentences.chinese: 引擎循環系統專用潤滑油，防鏽蝕，經濟耐用。

sentences.english: The attractive and durable household electrical appliances sell well.
sentences.chinese: 美觀耐用的家電用品，暢銷於市。

sentences.english: Durable, adopting auto painting process of imported car.
sentences.chinese: 採用進口轎車噴漆工藝，經久耐用。

sentences.english: Hand-painted polyurethane outsole ensures lightweight durability and flexible walking.
sentences.chinese: 手繪聚氨酯大底，確保輕便耐用性和靈活行走。

sentences.english: Specifically, it must be both durable and power efficient.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，它必須既要耐用又要節能。

definition: (Tw) (of a person) to have stamina/(of a product) durable/(mainland China) (vulgar) (usu. of a woman) alternative form of 耐肏 (enthusiastic as a sexual partner)
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
